channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3399] When did they become philosophical?
[+2735] Tiles: Didn't every kid do this? (PIC)
item.description: DeviantArtists MacDoninri (Don Dimanlig) reveals a common game as all kids must have seen it at some point: "Please tell me I'm not the only person who Jump-Tiles. Some think of lava, some think bottomless pit, some think of water, some think the lines are lasers. Some just jump just because they're colored and the others are not."

item.title: [+2130] Why are you upset? [PIC]
[+1576] 6 Things From History Everyone Pictures Incorrectly
item.description: Unsurprisingly, our image of the past is largely made up of Hollywood inventions, propaganda and uneducated guesses.

item.title: [+862] HDMI Could Soon be Replaced by New Cable Technology
item.description: A new audio/video cable technology is being developed that might spell the end of HDMI cables, which are currently used to connect a wide range of audio and video devices. The new technology is known as HDBaseT and carries audio and video signals and power on standard Cat 5e/6 Ethernet ...

item.title: [+845] She was used to getting A's. She got a C-, and was insulted.
item.description: Teens bathed from the cradle in affirmations and awards meant to boost their self-esteem created a sense of entitlement. They believe the future is theirs regardless of their talents, accomplishments or willingness to work. Today's youths have been praised so much that some flail at their first taste of criticism or failure, experts say.

item.title: [+760] Revealed: What Apple really thinks about its customers
item.description: Its products are launched with more hype than a new Madonna album and generate small armies of fanboys queuing around the block. As far as they are concerned, Apple can do no wrong. Until now.

item.title: [+741] It's Really Starting to Feel Like 1932
item.description: "Home sales are down. Retail sales are down. Factory orders in May suffered their biggest tumble since March of last year. So what are we doing about it? Less than nothing," he said. California is tightening faster than Greece. State workers have seen a 14pc fall in earnings this year due to forced furloughs. Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger is...

item.title: [+696] Hottest Gadgets of the 1980's [graphic]
[+634] Your Kids Are Getting High on Nutmeg Right Now
item.description: They are snorting it or eating a lot of it (3 or 4 tbsps) to get the "marijuana-like high" that the common spice can provide. Is this the little extra "Hmm" factor that Rachael Ray is always talking about?

item.description: Uruguay defender Martin Caceres punts Dutch midfielder Demy De Zeeuw directly in the face. Now do you still think soccer players are sissies who fake injuries?

item.description: The large frontal lobe is home to their interest in beer and motivates them to find it. Essentially, it is the ‘I love beer’ lobe.

item.title: [+551] The BP/Government Police State
item.description: Federal and local agents conspire with BP intimidate, impede and threaten journalists covering the oil spill.
